feed.title: Mercercrest Bridge Club Blog
feed.subtitle: A blog for the Mercercrest Bridge Club, mostly for results postings.

entry.title: January 27, 2026 Results
entry.content:
Thanks for coming to tonight’s game. Next week will be a club championship - extra masterpoints for the same price (for the winners)!

Mike and David won N/S and Craig and Nick won E/W.

Full results are available at https://mercerislandbridge.github.io/2026/260127E.htm

Common game results are available at https://thecommongame.com/NiteResults/20260127Rank.html
entry.summary: Thanks for coming to tonight’s game. Next week will be a club championship - extra masterpoints for the same price (for the winners)!

entry.title: January 20, 2026 Results
entry.content:
Thanks for coming to tonight’s game. Please remember that we want to start the game at 6:45 to ensure we are done by 10:00. This means we need people to arrive 5-10 minutes before that so that we can get everything started. If you are running late, please call or text someone so that we are sure that you are on your way. It is frequently the case that the movement is completely different if one person doesn’t show up.

Our winners tonight were Nathan and John in all three flights - Congratulations! Bryan and Stan won in the other direction.

Our next special game will be a Club Championship in two weeks.

Full results are available at https://mercerislandbridge.github.io/2026/260120E.htm

Common game results are available at https://thecommongame.com/NiteResults/20260120Rank.html

entry.title: January 13, 2026 Results
entry.content:
Thanks for coming to tonight’s game. Our winners tonight were Ray and Ann! Winning B and C flights were John Krah and Chris Morris-Lent.

Full results are available at https://mercerislandbridge.github.io/2026/260113E.htm

Common game results are available at https://thecommongame.com/NiteResults/20260113Rank.html

entry.title: January 06, 2026 Results
entry.content:
Thanks for coming to tonight’s game. I hope that everyone had a happy holiday season!

Next week we will have a Junior Fund game. This helps fund youth bridge - extra masterpoints for the same cost - the club picks up the extra fee!

Our winners tonight were the Mikes just ahead of Cornel and Dave G. Flight B winners were Hugh and Laura. Flight C winners were Arjun and Mudit.

Full results are available at https://mercerislandbridge.github.io/2026/260106E.htm

Common game results are available at https://thecommongame.com/NiteResults/20260106Rank.html
entry.summary: Thanks for coming to tonight’s game. I hope that everyone had a happy holiday season!

entry.title: December 30, 2025 Results
entry.content:
Thanks for coming to tonight’s game.

Thanks for coming tonight! We had 9.5 tables tonight and we weren’t sure we folks even wanted to play. Excellent. See everyone next Tuesday! Have a lovely new years.

Winners tonight are Stanford and David. Qinqin and Genie were first N/S.

Full results are available at https://mercerislandbridge.github.io/2025/251230E.htm

Common game results are available at https://thecommongame.com/NiteResults/20251230Rank.html
entry.summary: Thanks for coming to tonight’s game.

entry.title: December 09, 2025 Results
entry.content:
Thanks for coming to tonight’s game. Paul and Brad won tonight. Chris and Siva were second overall and won Flights B and C.

Next week is our Holiday Party and a GNT Swiss Teams. Let us know if you want help making a team, and please answer the survey about whether you are coming!

Full results are available at https://mercerislandbridge.github.io/2025/251209E.htm

Common game results are available at https://thecommongame.com/NiteResults/20251209Rank.html
entry.summary: Thanks for coming to tonight’s game. Paul and Brad won tonight. Chris and Siva were second overall and won Flights B and C.

entry.title: November 25, 2025 Results
entry.content:
Thanks for coming to tonight’s game. Remember there is not a game next week - see everyone in two weeks! Happy Thanksgiving, and good luck to all the San Francisco competitors.

Our winners tonight were Cornel and Dave. Flight B and C winners were John and Chris.

Full results are available at https://mercerislandbridge.github.io/2025/251125E.htm

Common game results are available at https://thecommongame.com/NiteResults/20251125Rank.html
entry.summary: Thanks for coming to tonight’s game. Remember there is not a game next week - see everyone in two weeks! Happy Thanksgiving, and good luck to all the San Francisco competitors.

entry.title: November 18, 2025 Results
entry.content:
Thanks for coming to tonight’s game. Our winners tonight were Bogdan and Aaron, Dong and Genie in Flight B, and Nick and Leyi in Flight C.

Remember that we will be open next week, and closed the week after. Then we will have our holiday party and team game the week after that.

Full results are available at https://mercerislandbridge.github.io/2025/251118E.htm

Common game results are available at https://thecommongame.com/NiteResults/20251118Rank.html
entry.summary: Thanks for coming to tonight’s game. Our winners tonight were Bogdan and Aaron, Dong and Genie in Flight B, and Nick and Leyi in Flight C.

entry.title: November 11, 2025 Results
entry.content:
Thanks for coming to tonight’s game - it was great to see so many players tonight. If you enjoy playing evening bridge please also come out to the Thursday night game at 13 Top Tricks!

Next week will be our quarterly club championship. We will be closed on December 2, and we will have a Holiday Party and Swiss Teams on December 16.

Our winners tonight were Stan and Cornel, closely followed by Kim and Eric. The Dong’s won the other direction with the Kasperkiewicz’s in second and winning Flight C.

Full results are available at https://mercerislandbridge.github.io/2025/251111E.htm

Common game results are available at https://thecommongame.com/NiteResults/20251111Rank.html
entry.summary: Thanks for coming to tonight’s game - it was great to see so many players tonight. If you enjoy playing evening bridge please also come out to the Thursday night game at 13 Top Tricks!
